body_html:
Is it that hard to add AUC calc and optimize by hand, I wonder?
In my opinion, making a continuous approximation of the AUC function will just do.

When I was using Theano, I tried to add the AUC loss with something related to some Mann Whitney Kernel, but I haven't tried that using TF yet.

body:
Is it that hard to add AUC calc and optimize by hand, I wonder?
In my opinion, making a continuous approximation of the AUC function will just do.

When I was using Theano, I tried to add the AUC loss with something related to some Mann Whitney Kernel, but I haven't tried that using TF yet.
